step1.title: üìù Take the skin quiz
step1.description:
Our skincare quiz takes just 2 minutes and helps us understand your unique skin type and specific needs.

By answering a few simple questions about your skin, lifestyle and preferences, we can create a tailored routine just for you.

The quiz analyzes factors like skin type, concerns, age and environment to give the most relevant recommendations.

step2.title: üéØ Get recommendations
step2.description:
Based on your answers, you receive a personal skincare plan with product recommendations specifically selected for your skin type and needs.

Our approach combines traditional skincare knowledge with modern science to create a complete routine.

You‚Äôll also get tips on how to use the products for optimal results.

step3.title: üìà Follow up
step3.description:
We support your journey every week to ensure continuous improvements.

With regular check-ins we can adjust your routine and give you personalised tips.

You‚Äôll get reminders and can document your progress to clearly see improvements over time.

step4.title: ‚ú® Perfect skin!
step4.description:

With our natural CBD and CBG products and a personalised routine, your skin becomes balanced, clearer and radiant.
